data.title: "Messed-up Message."
data.statement:
Cody was a former CodinGame member who was "laid off" for failing to contribute to the community. Now He is very opposed to anything to do with CodinGame. Cody has attempted to destroy CodinGame many times, coming up with very vile plans. However, Cody has been thwarted each time by <<CAMSA>>, <<"CodinGame's Anti-Malicious-System of Agents">>. CAMSA is now keeping a close eye on his movements.

Cody is sure that his plan is the best, most damaging plan yet. He has hacked into CG's communications system, and now has access to the messages sent and received by various CAMSA Agents.

Cody has enlisted <<you>> to create a program that messes up CAMSA's messages.
He hands you an intercepted message, some disruptive-characters [[dc]] to insert, and the [[Type]] of characters to insert the [[dc]] after (and a check for $5,000 as payment). You notice that the program doesn't cover uppercase letters and point it out to him. He looks at you and says <<"FORGET UPPERCASE LETTERS">>, they're too time-consuming!

[[dc]] can be made of letters, numbers and symbols.
{{vowel}} contains: <<a, e, i, o, u, and y>>.
Any English letter that isn't in {{vowel}} is a {{consonant}}.

testCases.title: Phase 1: Consonant-Tests
testCases.testIn:
at
consonant
Agent A, any sign of CODY?
testCases.testOut: Agatenattat A, anaty satigatnat ofat CODY?

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn:
a
consonant
Agent F, reporting... no sign of him.
testCases.testOut: Agaenata F, raepaoratainaga... nao saigana ofa haima.

testCases.title: Phase 2: Vowel-Tests
testCases.testIn:
eo
vowel
Agent B, what was that?

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn:
nag
vowel
Agent D, receiving some weird interference... over.
testCases.testOut: Agenagnt D, renagcenaginagvinagng sonagmenag wenaginagrd inagntenagrfenagrenagncenag... onagvenagr.

testCases.title: Wha... what was that?
testCases.testOut: Al@tel@te Ag@teen@tet@tes@te, t@teh@teis@te is@te a c@teyb@teer@te-at@tet@teac@tek@te. I b@teet@te CODY's@te b@teeh@tein@ted@te t@teh@teis@te...

testCases.title: THIS IS A CODE "RED"!
testCases.testIn:
oh
vowel
This is a Code Red!

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn:
ahem
vowel
Ok, change the case to capital!
testCases.testOut: Ok, chaahemngeahem theahem caahemseahem toahem caahempiahemtaaheml!

testCases.title: Cody! WE'RE WATCHING YOU.
testCases.testIn:
ode
vowel
CODY! YOU CAN'T MESS UP UPPERCASE MESSAGES!
testCases.testOut: CODY! YOU CAN'T MESS UP UPPERCASE MESSAGES!

data.stubGenerator:
read dc:string(10)
read Type:string(9)
read msg:string(100)

write CODY VS CAMSA
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: [[dc]] A string of the Disruptive-Characters to insert.
<<Line 2>>: [[Type]] A string either {{vowel}} or {{consonant}} denoting what letters to insert [[dc]] after.
<<Line 3>>: [[msg]] A string that is the message sent by CAMSA to one of its agents.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Cody was a former CodinGame member who was "laid off" for failing to contribute to the community. Now He is very opposed to anything to do with CodinGame. Cody has attempted to destroy CodinGame many times, coming up with very vile plans. However, Cody has been thwarted each time by CAMSA, "CodinGame's Anti-Malicious-System of Agents". CAMSA is now keeping a close eye on his movements.

Cody is sure that his plan is the best, most damaging plan yet. He has hacked into CG's communications system, and now has access to the messages sent and received by various CAMSA Agents.

Cody has enlisted you to create a program that messes up CAMSA's messages.
He hands you an intercepted message, some disruptive-characters dc to insert, and the Type of characters to insert the dc after (and a check for $5,000 as payment). You notice that the program doesn't cover uppercase letters and point it out to him. He looks at you and says "FORGET UPPERCASE LETTERS", they're too time-consuming!

dc can be made of letters, numbers and symbols.
vowel contains: a, e, i, o, u, and y.
Any English letter that isn't in vowel is a consonant.
Input
Line 1: dc A string of the Disruptive-Characters to insert.
Line 2: Type A string either vowel or consonant denoting what letters to insert dc after.
Line 3: msg A string that is the message sent by CAMSA to one of its agents.
Output
Line 1: The "Messed-up Message".
Constraints
0 < length of dc <= 5
5 <= length of msg < 100
Example
Input
at
consonant
Agent A, any sign of CODY?
Output
Agatenattat A, anaty satigatnat ofat CODY?
